title: Hour 2: Right The Ship
description:
Stephen A. is back from vacation and he's already arguing with Michael Irvin about the Cowboys, but this time they're arguing on a yacht!. Is Dallas the best team in the NFC East? Harry Douglas and Keyshawn Johnson are back on land with their takes. With Kevin Durant doubling down on his trade request with Nets owner Joe Tsai, we debate if he's justified in his demands. Stephen A. and Irvin decide if these NFL teams can "Right the Ship" this season. Plus, Stephen A. kicks off his top ten NFL storylines with Joe Burrow and the Bengals: are they primed for another deep run?
